text: Ezɨ Iesus danganir kam ategha zuima, gumazir damazir okavɨrɨzir pumuning an gɨn iza kamaghɨn an dei, “O Devitɨn Otarim, nɨ gan apangkufigh.”9:27 Judaba ghaze, Gumazir God ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevizim, Atrivim Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn otivam. Gumazir damazir okavɨrɨzir kamning nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesus ikia ghaze, Israelia gumazir kamra mɨzuai. Kamaghɨn aning dɨa ghaze, “Devitɨn Otarim.”
